segments.text: The kitchen layout is simple, with counters and cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A woman is busy drying a plate at the sink area.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes are stacked neatly to her right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window above offers a view of a pleasant garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Low plants border a path leading to a fence.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, the faucet gushes water into the overflowing basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It spills over, drenching the lower cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle forms at her feet, yet she remains unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy climbs the step stool toward the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His hand grabs from the cookie jar inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaches up, cooperating in the theft.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stealing cookies behind her back is just wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And that stool looks ready to give way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole setup screams impending chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but think of the mess that'll follow.
segments.speaker: PAR
